In looking at large logs from prior crawler runs, it'd be useful
to be able to extract:

  - lists of failed URIs -- esp. those from hosts that
    had other successes. These would likely serve as
    inputs to followup crawls.

  - longest URI pauses -- eg gaps in the timestamps

  - fastest amount of time between two visits to
    same host -- secondary verification that 
    politeness policies are working

  - others?

- Gordon
